mng: to lean, to slant, oblique, prejudiced, to deviate from average, to stray from the intended line, stubbornly, contrary to expectations, left-hand side of a split Chinese character, often the key or radical

exm.mng: to stress in a prejudiced way, to emphasize sth unduly
partial towards sth, to prefer, to incline, erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)
to prefer, to be partial to sth, preference
to be partial towards sth, to favor, to prefer, preference, favorite
remote, desolate, far from the city
paralysis of one side of the body, hemiplegia
